title-group.article-title: Bond Quality Rating Changes for Electric Utilities: A Multivariate Analysis

abstract.p: The large number of utility bond rating changes that took place between 1972 and 1976 have provided a unique opportunity to analyze such changes. This paper uses multiple discriminant analysis with three basic financial variables and four additional derived variables to analyze the cause of these ratings changes and to "predict" them. The two-group form of discriminant analysis was more successful than the three-group form. MDA was much more successful in predicting bond rating changes than it had been earlier in predicting the bond ratings themselves.
